verses.text_plain: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the Lord your God.
verses.verse_html:
1Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the Lord your God. ▼
▼ standing…: or, pillar
 , ▼
▼ image of…: or, figured stone: Heb. a stone of picture

footnotes.body_text: ▼ image of…: or, figured stone: Heb. a stone of picture
footnotes.body_html: ▼ image of…: or, figured stone: Heb. a stone of picture

verses.text_plain: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 2Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the Lord.

verses.text_plain: If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;
verses.verse_html: 3If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;

verses.text_plain: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
verses.verse_html: 4Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.

verses.text_plain: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.
verses.verse_html: 5And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.

verses.text_plain: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.
verses.verse_html:
6And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land. ▼
▼ rid: Heb. cause to cease

footnotes.body_html: ▼ rid: Heb. cause to cease

verses.text_plain: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.
verses.verse_html: 7And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.

verses.text_plain: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.
verses.verse_html: 8And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.

tokens.text: of you shall put ten thousand

verses.text_plain: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.
verses.verse_html: 9For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.

tokens.text: unto you, and make you fruitful

verses.text_plain: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.
verses.verse_html: 10And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.

verses.text_plain: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.
verses.verse_html: 11And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.

verses.text_plain: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.
verses.verse_html: 12And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.

verses.text_plain: I am the Lord your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.
verses.verse_html: 13I am the Lord your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.

tokens.text: that ye should not be their bondmen

verses.text_plain: But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;
verses.verse_html: 14But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;

tokens.text: But if ye will not hearken
unto me, and will not do

verses.text_plain: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:
verses.verse_html: 15And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:

tokens.text: so that ye will not do

verses.text_plain: I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it.
verses.verse_html:
16I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it. ▼
▼ over: Heb. upon

tokens.text: this unto you; I will even appoint

verses.text_plain: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.
verses.verse_html: 17And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.

tokens.text: against you, and ye shall be slain
over you; and ye shall flee

verses.text_plain: And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.
verses.verse_html: 18And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.

tokens.text: And if ye will not yet
unto me, then I will punish

verses.text_plain: And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:
verses.verse_html: 19And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:

verses.text_plain: And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.
verses.verse_html: 20And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.

verses.text_plain: And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins.
verses.verse_html:
21And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins. ▼
▼ contrary…: or, at all adventures with me

tokens.text: upon you according to your sins

footnotes.body_text: ▼ contrary…: or, at all adventures with me
footnotes.body_html: ▼ contrary…: or, at all adventures with me

verses.text_plain: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.
verses.verse_html: 22I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.

tokens.text: among you, which shall rob you of your children
and make you few in number

verses.text_plain: And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;
verses.verse_html: 23And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;

tokens.text: And if ye will not be reformed
by me by these things, but will walk

verses.text_plain: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.
verses.verse_html: 24Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.

verses.text_plain: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.
verses.verse_html: 25And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.

tokens.text: and when ye are gathered together
you; and ye shall be delivered

verses.text_plain: And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.
verses.verse_html: 26And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.

verses.text_plain: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;
verses.verse_html: 27And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;

tokens.text: And if ye will not for all this

verses.text_plain: Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.
verses.verse_html: 28Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.

verses.text_plain: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.
verses.verse_html: 29And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.

verses.text_plain: And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.
verses.verse_html: 30And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.

verses.text_plain: And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.
verses.verse_html: 31And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.

verses.text_plain: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.
verses.verse_html: 32And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.

verses.text_plain: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.
verses.verse_html: 33And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.

verses.text_plain: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies’ land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.
verses.verse_html: 34Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies’ land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.

verses.text_plain: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.
verses.verse_html: 35As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.

verses.text_plain: And upon them that are left alive of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth.
verses.verse_html:
36And upon them that are left alive of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth. ▼
▼ shaken: Heb. driven

tokens.text: And upon them that are left

verses.text_plain: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.
verses.verse_html: 37And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.

tokens.text: and ye shall have no power to stand

verses.text_plain: And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.
verses.verse_html: 38And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.

verses.text_plain: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies’ lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.
verses.verse_html: 39And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies’ lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.

verses.text_plain: If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;
verses.verse_html: 40If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;

tokens.text: against me, and that also they have walked

verses.text_plain: And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:
verses.verse_html: 41And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:

tokens.text: of the punishment of their iniquity

verses.text_plain: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.
verses.verse_html: 42Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.

verses.text_plain: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.
verses.verse_html: 43The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.

tokens.text: without them: and they shall accept
of the punishment of their iniquity

verses.text_plain: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the Lord their God.
verses.verse_html: 44And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the Lord their God.

tokens.text: I will not cast them away

verses.text_plain: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 45But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the Lord.

tokens.text: But I will for their sakes remember
that I might be their God

verses.text_plain: These are the statutes and judgments and laws, which the Lord made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.
verses.verse_html: 46These are the statutes and judgments and laws, which the Lord made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.
